fields.label: Choose Footer to Display
fields.name: global_footer_selector
fields.instructions:
Choose the the content you would like to show in the footer. You can choose from the following footers:

1. Default Footer: shows location, hours, directions, pages, latest articles and email subscription form
2. Widgets: 4 Column Footer setup using the "WordPress Widgets"
3. Custom Footer: Blank row that allows you to enter in your own html

To customize the "Widgets" Footer, go to the "Widget Settings" and drag the widgets you would like to display into the corresponding widget containers. The containers for the footer are Footer 1, Footer 2, Footer 3 and Footer 4.
